etymology.description: 现(現) (xiàn, "current"; "present"; "appear") refers to the present time or situation. 金(金) (jīn, "gold"; "money"; "metal") represents wealth or monetary resources. Together, 现金(現金) (xiànjīn) describes money that is immediately available for transactions - cash.
etymology.interpretation: The term 现金(現金) (xiànjīn, "cash") signifies money available for use right now, emphasizing both its availability and standard function as a currency.

examples.chinese: 我用现金买了面包(我用現金買了麵包)。
商店只接受现金(商店只接受現金)，不接受信用卡(不接受信用卡)。
examples.pinyin: Shāngdiàn zhǐ jiēshòu xiànjīn, bù jiēshòu xìnyòngkǎ.
examples.english: The store accepts only cash, not credit cards.

examples.chinese: 出门前(出門前)，他检查是否携带了现金(他檢查是否攜帶了現金)。
examples.pinyin: Chūmén qián, tā jiǎnchá shìfǒu xiédài le xiànjīn.
examples.english: Before leaving home, he checked whether he brought cash.
